bibl.seg: D.L. Cairns (Text, Introductory Essays, and Interpretative Commentary), D.L.C. & J.G. Howie (Translations), Bacchylides. Five Epinician Odes (3, 5, 9, 11, 13) = ARCA. Classical and Medieval Texts, Papers and Monographs. 49.
